role_description: An Ansible role that installs Motrix, the download manager, on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Motrix](https://motrix.app/) is a full-featured download manager that supports downloading HTTP, FTP, BitTorrent, Magnet, etc.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Motrix, the download manager, on nearly any platform.
